sections.heading: indebtedness; election required; manner of submission
sections.text: At the time of or before incurring any bonded indebtedness the question shall be submitted to the people in the manner provided by law in cases of borrowing money for internal improvements.SourceLaws 1891, c. 36, ยง 7, p. 290;R.S.1913, ยง 1930;C.S.
